name: One Last Call
description:
Created for InkJam 2021

The world is about to end. People are freaking out. Somehow, you ended up volunteering at a hotline to help people cope. Honestly, this probably won't be your weirdest choice.

Pick up calls, work through their concerns. 

Only 8 hours to go, and all you have to do is stay calm! Or not.

How will you spend your last moments?

One Last Call was our entry for InkJam 2021. Leave your feedback in the comments!
